AVOption(name='win_size', help='set the window size', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_INT', default=2048, min=32.0, max=65536.0, flags='A', unit=None)
AVOption(name='win_func', help='set window function', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_INT', default='WFUNC_HANNING', min=0.0, max='NB_WFUNC-1', flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='rect', help='Rectangular', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_RECT', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='bartlett', help='Bartlett', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_BARTLETT', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='hann', help='Hann', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_HANNING', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='hanning', help='Hanning', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_HANNING', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='hamming', help='Hamming', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_HAMMING', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='blackman', help='Blackman', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_BLACKMAN', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='welch', help='Welch', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_WELCH', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='flattop', help='Flat-top', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_FLATTOP', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='bharris', help='Blackman-Harris', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_BHARRIS', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='bnuttall', help='Blackman-Nuttall', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_BNUTTALL', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='bhann', help='Bartlett-Hann', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_BHANN', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='sine', help='Sine', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_SINE', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='nuttall', help='Nuttall', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_NUTTALL', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')

AVOption(name='tukey', help='Tukey', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_TUKEY', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='dolph', help='Dolph-Chebyshev', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_DOLPH', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='cauchy', help='Cauchy', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_CAUCHY', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='parzen', help='Parzen', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_PARZEN', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')

AVOption(name='kaiser', help='Kaiser', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_CONST', default='WFUNC_KAISER', min=0.0, max=0.0, flags='A', unit='win_func')
AVOption(name='overlap', help='set window overlap', type='AV_OPT_TYPE_FLOAT', default=0.5, min=0.0, max=1.0, flags='A', unit=None)
